results.csv_string_response: The net sales, operating income, operating income, and operating income (loss) for the Fiscal Years Ended, March 31, 2018 and 2017 are $202.0 million, $182.2 million, $182.2 million, and $182.2 million respectively.
results.json_rows_response: Net sales increased $19.7 million or 10.8% from $182.2 million in fiscal year 2017. The increase in net sales was primarily driven by an increase in net sales in the distributor channel across all the APAC and EMEA regions of $13.7 million, a $3.3 million increase in net sales in the OEM channel across the Americas, APAC, and JPKO regions. These increases were partially offset by a decrease in net sales of $1.2 million in the OEM channel across the Americas, APAC, and JPKO regions. In addition, there was a favorable impact of $7.6 million from foreign currency exchange primarily due to the change in the value of the Euro compared to the U.S. dollar.
